name: Stickman Dismounting 3D
description:
From the creator and the success of the Stickman Dismounting 2D, we have optimized and create new 3D version to make it a better and more creative experience.
Perform death-defying motor stunts, crash into walls, create traffic pile-ups of epic scale - and share the fun!
FEATURES:
- 3D Physics and Ragdoll
- unique active ragdoll physics system
- crunchy sound effects
- 20 levels
- 10 vehicles
- Special props of various types 3D
- Save video gameplay on Everyplay page
- Uses permission "Camera" and "Record Audio" to use video recording mode when playing
HOW TO PLAY:
- Very simple, "Tap and Hold" on button Start, "Eject" if you want and "Steers" change character direction.

Stickman Tubo Dismounting 3D (turbocharged or regular) is not to be attempted at home or outside. We do not recommend or condone dismount attempts outside 3D computer simulations.
